This is a unified, consistent, and successive instrument (with general criteria, questionnaires and database) which allows to measure employees’ satisfaction rate on the regular basis and to add transparency to the resource management efforts.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who should help
